scoringPlays.text: Laviska Shenault Jr. 49 Yd Run (James Stefanou Kick)
Tyler Vaughns 27 Yd pass from JT Daniels (Michael Brown Kick)
Michael Pittman Jr. 65 Yd pass from JT Daniels (Michael Brown Kick)
Michael Pittman Jr. 9 Yd pass from JT Daniels (Michael Brown Kick)
Ajene Harris 6 Yd Interception Return (Michael Brown Kick)
Kyle Evans 2 Yd Run (James Stefanou Kick)
Steven Montez 19 Yd Run (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)

videos.headline: Shenault Jr. scores 51-yard TD on wildcat play
videos.description: Laviska Shenault Jr breaks free for a 51-yard touchdown on a wildcat play, giving Colorado their first score.

videos.headline: JT Daniels fires a bullet down field to tie game
videos.description: JT Daniels shows off his accuracy with a 27-yard touchdown pass to Tyler Vaughns to tie it at 7-7.

videos.headline: USC WR bails out under-throw for TD
videos.description: Michael Pittman Jr. bails out JT Daniel's under-thrown ball and races to the end zone for USC's first lead of the night.
